column4: hi... i cant seem to get pass the login. If i enter pass word it return me back to login. Help please
it is not a wrong password issue and i am very sure of that
do you have caps lock on
no... and there is no message like wrong password or anything like that
When i enter the password and hit enter, it behaves like it is about to go to the desktop and then just retun back to login
it returns back to login like that when you get password wrong
I am already in console an logged in
how can i post content of the Xorg.0.log from console?
Use nano /path/to/file unless its the path your asking about
apt-get install pastebinit and then run /var/log/Xorg.0.log | pastebinit
can yo please hold on a min... i dont know why, but it seems the internet connection is lost from the computer as well
